title: "The Impact Of Digital Screens On Vision: Navigating The Digital Eye Strain Epidemic"
excerpt: "Blue Light Exposure - Digital screens emit blue light, a high-energy visible (HEV) light that can penetrate the eyes and cause eye fatigue, strain and discomfort. Screen Glare and Reflections - Glare and reflections on screens can force the eyes to work harder, contributing to eye strain and fatigue."
